title: Cyber Security & Ethical Hacking Workshop
Short Description: Learn the basics of cybersecurity and ethical hacking in a 2-day workshop.
Description: This workshop by Cappriciosec University introduces you to the world of cybersecurity. It covers Linux basics, Python scripting for hacking, social media exploitation techniques, password cracking methods, and web application penetration testing. Bonus modules include ATM card cloning and FM radio hacking.
What you'll learn: ATM Card Cloning Concepts (for awareness only)
